product_name: FalconGuides Road Biking Colorado's Front Range: A Guide to the Greatest Bike Rides from Colorao Springs to Fort Collins
long_description: Features 32 carefully designed rides between Colorado Springs and Fort Collins--from the cities to the foothills and everywhere in between.
